Can’t get rid of .md files 1 new_session: yes example

Can’t get rid of .md files 1 new_session: yes example The contents of _bookdown.yml are: output_dir: docs new_session: yes delete_merged_file: true and the contents of _output.yml are: bookdown::gitbook: keep_md: false yet docs/index.md remains after rendering. The same is the case with bookdown::render_book("index.Rmd", new_session = TRUE, clean = TRUE)
